title: Honey glazed lamb and celeriac mash
description: Lamb reared on salt marshes has a unique flavour much celebrated by chefs. Here it's cooked low and slow for the most tender meat.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
500g/1lb 2oz potatoes, peeled and cut into 2cm/ ¾in cubes
500g/1lb 2oz celeriac, peeled and cut into 4cm/1½in cubes
salt and freshly ground black pepper
